credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: variation of cross stitch on plain weave
description: Pattern of curving plant and leaves in red silk on linen. Traces of overcastting and knotted decorative seam are at the top and bottom of the piece.
name: Band
